allergen_policy: We take food allergies seriously. Please inform your server of any allergies when ordering.

gluten.description: Found in wheat, barley, rye, and related grains
gluten.notes: We offer gluten-free pasta and pizza bases. Cross-contamination possible in kitchen.

dairy.description: Milk and milk products including cheese, butter, cream
dairy.notes: Vegan cheese available for pizzas and pasta dishes

eggs.notes: Many pasta dishes can be made without eggs

fish.notes: Clearly marked on menu. Separate preparation area available upon request

shellfish.description: Shrimp, crab, lobster, and other crustaceans
shellfish.notes: Seafood dishes clearly marked. Cross-contamination possible

nuts.description: Tree nuts including almonds, walnuts, pistachios
nuts.notes: Pistachio gelato contains nuts. Other dishes can be made nut-free

soy.notes: Used in some vegan dishes as dairy substitute

sesame.notes: Used in tahini dressing for Buddha Bowl

vegetarian.description: Multiple vegetarian options including pasta, pizza, and salads

vegan.description: Dedicated vegan menu items with plant-based alternatives

gluten_free.description: Gluten-free pasta and pizza bases available

cross_contamination_warning: While we take precautions, our kitchen handles all major allergens. We cannot guarantee 100% allergen-free meals.

contact.note: Please call ahead for severe allergies so we can prepare safely
